meanings.definition: Independence or freedom to make one's own decisions.
meanings.sent1: Having autonomy allows individuals to choose their own path.
meanings.sent2: The country fought for autonomy from foreign rule.
meanings.sent3: The robot demanded autonomy to decide its own tasks.
meanings.sent4: In the world of bees, each queen bee has the autonomy to lead her hive.
meanings.sent5: The student council granted autonomy to the students to plan the event.

meanings.sent1: The autonomous car drove itself to the destination.
meanings.sent2: She showed great autonomy in managing her own business.
meanings.sent3: The cat acted with autonomy, refusing to follow any commands.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush moved with autonomy, creating a masterpiece on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The team worked with autonomy, each member contributing their unique skills.
